attributes.action: Legalization of Cannabis for medical and recreational use
attributes.additional_details:
A Harvard medical student has proven that cannabis is not linked to schizophrenia and other mental issues but is genetic 
https://psychcentral.com/news/2013/12/10/harvard-marijuana-doesnt-cause-schizophrenia/63148.html
attributes.background:
The misuse of drug act 1971 is well out dated and needs to be changed.
Cannabis should be legalised for medical and recreational use  
An important point is that if cannabis was legalised and taxed it would bring in billions which would in turn help fund our struggling nhs, schools and much more.
